sentences.en: Complies with industry standards for data security, browser compatibility, and accessibility.
sentences.cn: 遵守并执行有关数据安全 、 浏览器兼容性, 以及残疾人使用方便等方面的工业标准.

sentences.en: Copy and paste the link below into your web browser.
sentences.cn: 复制并粘贴到您的网页浏览器下面的链接.

sentences.en: In your Web browser's cache are the most recent Web files that you have downloaded.
sentences.cn: 网页浏览器的高速缓存区里有你最近下载的网页文件。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, browser deployed software can be as rich as any other application.
sentences.cn: 同时, 浏览器部署软件可以像其他应用程序一样丰富.

sentences.en: Netscape 1.0 was written as an alternative browser to NCSA Mosaic.
Now you should see readable text, split over lines , in your browser.
sentences.cn: 现在你应该在浏览器上, 能够看到可读的文本.

sentences.en: Parses template and sends to standard output ( Browser ).
sentences.cn: 解析范本,并传送到标准输出 ( 浏览器 ).

sentences.en: Press the "reload" button on your web browser to refresh the site and get the most current version.
sentences.cn: 点击网页浏览器上的“刷新”按钮来刷新页面，显示最新的版本。

sentences.en: Select Browse Definition to view external components in the Object Browser.
sentences.cn: 选择“浏览定义”可在“对象浏览器”中查看外部组件.

sentences.en: Sorry ! This application only supports Internet Explorer browser right now.
sentences.cn: 这项服务暂时只支援微软探索者浏览器.

sentences.en: The response is rendered by the user's Web browser.
sentences.cn: 这个相应会被用户的Web浏览器表示出来.

sentences.en: This newly available ability to deliver complex behavior in a browser demands application - quality interaction design.
sentences.cn: 浏览器具备这种可以提供复杂行为的新能力,为此需要交互设计应当像对待普通应用软件一样来对待这些新应用.

sentences.en: Use the built - in WAP browser to test the profile.
sentences.cn: 使用手机内 置 的浏览嚣来测试选项.

sentences.en: You just to upload the files and access it in your browser.
sentences.cn: 您只必须上载文件和访问它在您的浏览器.这就是创造原创文章的全部.

sentences.en: You view a browse information file in the Object Browser.
sentences.cn: 在对象浏览器中查看浏览信息文件.

words.tran_cn: 浏览；吃草；漫不经心地看商品
[计]浏览器；吃嫩叶的动物；浏览书本的人

trans.tran_en: a computer program that finds information on the Internet and shows it on your computer screen
